<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6800</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Furnaces Crossword</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama sobre hornos</string>
            <string language="ga">Foirnéisí – Crosfhocal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ofen-Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé De Fours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword Das Fornalhas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate Delle Fornaci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σταυρόλεξο φούρνων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A crossword dealing with terms used primarily with the blast, basic oxygen and electric arc furnaces.</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama sobre términos usados principalmente con los altos hornos, hornos de oxígeno básico y horno de arco eléctrico.</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal faoi théarmaí a úsáidtear go príomha le foirnéisí soinneáin, gnáthfhoirnéisí agus stuafhoirnéisí leictreacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Engineering</string>
            <string language="es">Ingeniería</string>
            <string language="ga">Innealtóireacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">IronSteel</string>
            <string language="es">Hierro. Acero. Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">Iarann Cruach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Kreuzworträtsel, das die Bezeichnungen 
verwendet hauptsächlich mit dem Knall, dem grundlegenden Sauerstoff 
und den Lichtbogenöfen beschäftigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des mots croisé traitant des termes utilisés 
principalement avec le souffle, l'oxygène de base et les fours d'arc 
électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um crossword que trata dos termos usados 
primeiramente com a explosão, o oxigênio básico e as fornalhas de 
arco elétrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lle parole incrociate che si occupano dei termini 
usati soprattutto con lo scoppio, l'ossigeno di base ed i forni ad 
arco elettrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σταυρόλεξο που εξετάζει τους όρους που 
χρησιμοποιούνται πρώτιστα με το φύσημα, το βασικό οξυγόνο και 
τους φούρνους ηλεκτρικών τόξων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">IronSteel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relevante Web site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ingénierie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">IronSteel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sites Web Appropriés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Engenharia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">IronSteel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web site Relevantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ingegneria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">IronSteel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web site Relativi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμοσμένη μηχανική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">IronSteel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετικοί ιστοχώροι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
